channel.title: Add Models to 508 HD
channel.description:
Alright, so I was wondering.. How do you add models to the new 508 HD clients?
In 317, you just pasted the GZipped model into the correct folder and that was pretty much it.. But with 508 HD, there is no Models folder, and the client.java file contains no "add models" command.
Thanks in advance. =].

item.title: Add Models to 508 HD
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

Alright, so I was wondering.. How do you add models to the new 508 HD clients?

i was more wondering about the new 508 HD clients, but those methods you showed above could really help. im gonna take a look around the client’s coding to see if it’s similar to 508 LD.

also, thanks to all that posted. i have all the 508 HD models using RSMV, so all I need to do is edit them and find a way to manually add them to the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Models to 508 HD
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

davidi2:

Thats HD?

Noooo, that’s my 317, with 508 character, armour and weapon models.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 10-08-2009, 23:14:10[/size][hr][quote=“davidi2, post:5, topic:294162”]He knows he can add to 508, hes asking about HD[/quote]

Where did he state that?
He said he knew how to add in 317, that was about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Models to 508 HD
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Thats HD?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 10 August 2009, 15:11:58[/size][hr]He knows he can add to 508, hes asking about HD

item.title: Add Models to 508 HD
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Fat Cookies:

I dont believe anyone has got to the point of adding custom models to a 508. If you feel your up to the challenge why dont you try to program the client to load models (this would probably be advanced though)

You are mistaken.
The methods were released a few months back, just no one could be bothered to use them.
Here. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,356459.0.html

Fat Cookies:

soon the client will look like a 508 but still use the original game engine.

Way ahead of ya.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Models to 508 HD
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

i may try to program the 508… it might take some time but ill report back with any improvements.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Models to 508 HD
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I dont believe anyone has got to the point of adding custom models to a 508. If you feel your up to the challenge why dont you try to program the client to load models (this would probably be advanced though)

imo, stick with 317, soon the client will look like a 508 but still use the original game engine.

Read full topic
